title: Valencia interested in Lucas Moura as race for PSG winger hots up
description: Valencia have joined the list of clubs interested in securing the services of Paris Saint-Germain winger Lucas Moura, Sky Sports News understands.
content: The 25-year-old has barely played for the Ligue 1 side this season and recently revealed his unhappiness in France, saying he was looking to find a new club.Competition appears to be heating up for Moura, with Tottenham thought to be one of two Premier League clubs interested.Sky Sports News also understands Moura's preference is to come to the Premier League.Sky in Italy reported on Tuesday that Moura's agents were meeting with Napoli sporting director Cristiano Giuntoli on Wednesday.Chinese Super League side Shandong Luneng Taishan are also monitoring Moura's situation in Paris.PSG are understood to only be considering permanent offers for Moura as they are conscious of complying with UEFA Financial Fair Play rules and it is thought they will deal at around Â£23m.
